CustomField.description: Used to determine if the Edit Bids Button is displayed on the Mass Edit Counterparties
CustomField.formula: RecordType.Name = 'Buyside' || RecordType.Name = 'Sellside' || RecordType.Name = 'Sellside' || RecordType.Name = 'Sellside Division' || RecordType.Name = 'Illiquid Financial Assets'
CustomField.label: Counterparty Bids Available
